name: CIA Agent Shooting School Game
description:
Be the best sniper assassin shooter and strike sniper agent of CIA.

Enemy has infiltrated in our land with a heavy force & will bombing and shooting on our bunkers and frontline bases. Suddenly enemy has started this breach of peace treaty and has shown his terrorist face. We have faced a great loss as hundreds of our Army soldiers have been killed since the battle has started. Our snipers retaliated but their bombing and shelling was heavy so our soldiers could not retaliate properly. To retaliate we needed time and it was not our chance.
Soldier! Now is the time we do the secret training of our battalion who would fight these coward forces who have attacked our mother land. Government is unaware of this secret training going on in the secret military camp. As it is a shooting training, intelligence agencies are aware of this secret mission. Mission has to be completed and executed in perfect way. This is the time we prepare our sniper shooters who are willing to get the hardest training and be prepare for another battle with heavy weapons and guns. Be it infantry, cavalry, armor or support units, we have to be at our toes. You have various missions and tasks to complete within the given time. You will aim, hit and shoot sliding, moving, flying and alive objects in your shooting training. The best experience to be ruthless sniper shooter. Be a cruel unmerciful shooter.
You would be trained as a sniper to kill the enemy soldiers. Make them step back and send them to hell. This is the final fight after which you would be given tribute as the heroes of the nation. Never back down. Be the one everyone looks up to. Sniper strike is the only way you can kill them in their bunkers and tanks. We have weapons, iron tanks, guns and sniper guns. Now you have to be the best sniper shooter to assassinate the enemy forces. Assassin the attacking soldiers and teach them a lesson they will never forget. Assassin anyone who is coming your way or you see on the line of control. It is a secret agent attack on the enemy which the state does not knows of.

Features:
-Amazing 3d environments
-Real life sound effects
-Missions to accomplish
-Challenging levels
-Multiple weapons to use
-Secret intelligence training game
